findings.details: Complete ScaffoldPlugin implementation verified. Exports default plugin object with all required fields: commandType='overview', description='Generate a numbered index overview of the project structure', parserFunction=parseOverview (async function), supportsCompare=false. Includes proper TypeScript types imported from '../scaffold-cli.js'. Plugin is production-ready with 235 lines of well-structured code including error handling, file filtering, and both JSON/text output modes.

recommendations: Parser implementation is complete and meets all acceptance criteria
overview.ts provides a robust project scanning capability with ignore patterns for common directories (node_modules, .git, etc.)
Plugin supports additional specificOptions (json flag) beyond the base interface
Code quality is high with proper TypeScript typing, error handling, and documentation
scout_signature: SCOUT-007 | Reconnaissance Complete | All Objectives Met
